data.eml:eml: Revision of the subfamily Bactrodinae (Heteroptera, Reduviidae), with a phylogenetic analysis of Bactrodes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coscarón, Maria Del Carmen, Melo, Maria Cecilia (2003): Revision of the subfamily Bactrodinae (Heteroptera, Reduviidae), with a phylogenetic analysis of Bactrodes. Zootaxa 304: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156879
